topic.title: Antilibrary
topic.body:
Anybody here having experience downloading books from the antilibrary?

Could you please explain how?

I only get those links

Antilibrary Direct Link
View on Goodreads 

when clicking on a book, but clicking the "Antilibrary Direct Link" just brings up the main page again :-(

topic.title: China 19217 peers
topic.body: Can this number be correct? I highly doubt that ZeroNet is that common in China - what do you think?

1584198532_1Jgu3kQaBojGnFj82E6Gd3tsyAsKC.body:
Could somebody please give an explanation on how these figures are calculated - what they mean?

China 570 peers
United States 285 peers
Netherlands 59 peers
Australia 57 peers
Brazil 56 peers
France 50 peers
Russia 41 peers
United Kingdom 40 peers
Canada 37 peers
Austria 32 peers
Germany 32 peers
Taiwan 28 peers
Singapore 21 peers
Japan 19 peers
Other 198 peers

> [gitcenter](#comment_1311_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2nK5Di): Your ZeroNet instance connects to other instances from all over the world to fetch new data from sites or submit your comments/posts/etc. The numbers show the distribution of the peers you've connected to recently. Please note that it's definitely not the list of all peers, it's just the ones you've connected to yourself.

Further questions:

" ZeroNet instance connects" - i assume this can be active (when I click on sides) and passive (how)?

"The numbers show the distribution of the peers you've connected to recently." connected to would be active and would show that that I contacted them and not they contacted me?

"recently" - what time frame is that exactly?
Does the global map left to the figures just show where those IPs from "Top Countries"are located or is there any other information in this map?

Has anynody else made the experience that these number tenfolded over the last month?

If so, what could be the reasons?

Thats today's update. Anybody else having such enormous figures using Tor?
I cant believe those numbers for China an the US ? This would also be 100 times more than 6 months ago?

Top country
United States 24903 peers
China 19217 peers
Germany 775 peers
United Kingdom 654 peers
Russia 653 peers
France 585 peers
Brazil 473 peers
Canada 385 peers
Spain 355 peers
Italy 345 peers
Australia 302 peers
Belgium 205 peers
Netherlands 191 peers
Portugal 166 peers
Other 2492 peers

Thanks
There is a database file of nearly 600MB which then is not needed anymore I guess ?

Yes interessting question !

Why do you say its not liked in China? Not liked by whom?

> [krombopulusmike](#comment_43_1BfrmacRWaPSuHVmRdvaMUYykqd2MGRo5e): Americans proxying through China

Do you know a single proxy in China? I dont!

1570989643_1HFbnmQ8wBoYBNqZy2wVfyLg19v4W.body: What is the sense in sharing those certificates, if I don't know who these people are?
